data.text: @HCS_GovNL This should be considered hate speech. Hate against our people and trying to weaken our children so they cant reproduce or mentally excel because of neurological issues.  Complete overhaul of the health board in NL required immediately!!!

@HCS_GovNL Because my nan needs help with cookies?? Are you frigging kidding me? Any nan would break out her slipper for you hinting they wouldn't let nanny's girl bake cookies if they weren't jabbed. Just WOW

@HCS_GovNL Stop promoting danger. Enough information has come to light about about the dangers of vaccines. You're asking us to risk the fate of our children. And change that stupid "just get it" logo. Promote health not risk, tell people to wash their hands and social distance. Disgusting
@HCS_GovNL Health and community services are murdering people. Go read the 9 pages of side effects from the Pfizer documents you effing morons.
